query:
UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Rabbit Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Gentleness and Harmony - The Sacred Guardian of the Rabbit',
  description = 'In the ancient wisdom of Chinese astrology, the Rabbit symbolizes gentleness, diplomacy, and quiet strength of compassion. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
In Chinese astrology, the Rabbit represents the moon''s gentle influence—intuitive, artistic, and deeply connected to the rhythms of nature. Those born under this sign possess a natural grace and the ability to bring harmony to any situation.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy from Manjushri Bodhisattva—the embodiment of transcendent wisdom—directly into each pendant. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every piece with protective power and spiritual blessings that shield the wearer from negative influences.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate zodiac engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the divine protection that watches over you even in life''s darkest moments.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born in the Year of the Rabbit (1951, 1963, 1975, 1987, 1999, 2011, 2023)
- Individuals seeking to embody the Rabbit''s noble qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual protection
- Those who wish to attract prosperity and good fortune

May this sacred talisman guide you through life''s journey with wisdom, courage, and unwavering protection.'
WHERE id = 510004;

UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Dragon Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Power and Nobility - The Sacred Guardian of the Dragon',
  description = 'In the ancient wisdom of Chinese astrology, the Dragon symbolizes power, nobility, and auspicious fortune. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
The Dragon is the most revered creature in Chinese culture, symbolizing imperial authority, divine blessing, and limitless potential. Those born in the Year of the Dragon are destined for greatness, blessed with natural charisma and the ability to inspire others.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy from Manjushri Bodhisattva—the embodiment of transcendent wisdom—directly into each pendant. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every piece with protective power and spiritual blessings that shield the wearer from negative influences.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate zodiac engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the divine protection that watches over you even in life''s darkest moments.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born in the Year of the Dragon (1952, 1964, 1976, 1988, 2000, 2012, 2024)
- Individuals seeking to embody the Dragon''s noble qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual protection
- Those who wish to attract prosperity and good fortune

May this sacred talisman guide you through life''s journey with wisdom, courage, and unwavering protection.'
WHERE id = 510005;

UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Snake Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Wisdom and Transformation - The Sacred Guardian of the Snake',
  description = 'In the ancient wisdom of Chinese astrology, the Snake symbolizes wisdom, intuition, and transformative power. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
The Snake represents profound insight and the ability to shed old patterns, emerging renewed. Those born under this sign possess deep wisdom and the gift of seeing beyond surface appearances into the heart of matters.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy from Manjushri Bodhisattva—the embodiment of transcendent wisdom—directly into each pendant. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every piece with protective power and spiritual blessings that shield the wearer from negative influences.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate zodiac engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the divine protection that watches over you even in life''s darkest moments.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born in the Year of the Snake (1953, 1965, 1977, 1989, 2001, 2013, 2025)
- Individuals seeking to embody the Snake''s noble qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual protection
- Those who wish to attract prosperity and good fortune

May this sacred talisman guide you through life''s journey with wisdom, courage, and unwavering protection.'
WHERE id = 510006;
